description:
Great for the water, in more ways than you think. Patagonia has reimagined their classic Baggies, now these iconic boardshorts are made from recycled fishing nets. The recycled nylon has a DWR finish, so these shorts dry quickly and are tough enough for active days in the sand or on the water.

  • NetPlus® 100% postconsumer recycled nylon made from recycled fishing nets, helping to reduce ocean plastic pollution
  • Elastic waistband with internal drawstring provides a flexible yet secure fit
  • Vertical side pockets are hydrodynamic when swimming and drain themselves when you get out, thanks to clever internal mesh corners
  • Rear snap pocket
name: Patagonia Baggies Shorts - Men's
